channel.title: Diamanti D-Series quick start guide on Welcome to Diamanti!
channel.description: Recent content in Diamanti D-Series quick start guide on Welcome to Diamanti!

item.title: Quick start guide
item.description: Audience This document is designed for the following users: Cluster administrators User administrators Storage administrators Network administrators Developers Cluster, storage, and network administrators ensure the proper deployment and daily operation of an organization’s IT infrastructure, including Diamanti D-Series appliances. Developers, meanwhile, deploy containers on Diamanti appliances. Introducing the Diamanti D-Series Appliance Diamanti provides a hyperconverged platform for running Linux containers that integrates with open source software including Docker and Kubernetes.
